committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution authorizing the President to designate the 29th day in May of each year as John Fitzgerald Kennedy Memorial Day.

summary.text: Authorizes the President of the United States to issue a proclamation each year designating the 29th day in May as "John Fitzgerald Kennedy Memorial Day."

titles.title: Joint resolution authorizing the President to designate the 29th day in May of each year as John Fitzgerald Kennedy Memorial Day.
